AirConditioner.airConditionerMode: Allows for the control of the air conditioner.
AirConditioner.switch: Allows for the control of a switch device

AirPurifier.switch: Allows for the control of a switch device
AirPurifier.airPurifierFanMode: Maintains and sets the state of an air purifier's fan

AirQualityDetector.tvocMeasurement: Measure total volatile organic compound levels
AirQualityDetector.temperatureMeasurement: Get the temperature from a Device that reports current temperature
AirQualityDetector.dustSensor: Gets the reading of the dust sensor.
AirQualityDetector.relativeHumidityMeasurement: Allow reading the relative humidity from devices that support it

Alarm.alarm: The Alarm skill allows for interacting with devices that serve as alarms
Alarm.battery: Defines that the device has a battery

Blind.blindLevel: Allows for the control of the level of a blind.
Blind.blind: Allows for the control of the blind.

Button.button: A device with one or more buttons

Camera.switch: Allows for the control of a switch device
Camera.camera: Allows for the control of a camera device

Charger.voltageMeasurement: Get the value of voltage measured from devices that support it
Charger.currentMeasurement: Get the value of electrical current measured from a device.
Charger.chargingState: The current status of battery charging

ContactSensor.contactSensor: Allows reading the value of a contact sensor device

Curtain.curtain: Allows for the control of the curtain.

Dehumidifier.dehumidifierMode: Allows for the control of the dehumidifier mode.
Dehumidifier.switch: Allows for the control of a switch device

Dishwasher.dishwasherMode: Allows for the control of the dishwasher mode.
Dishwasher.switch: Allows for the control of a switch device

DoorLock.doorControl: Allow for the control of a door

Fan.switch: Allows for the control of a switch device
Fan.fanControl: Allows for the control of the fan.

Feeder.switch: Allows for the control of a switch device
Feeder.feederPortion: Allows for the portion control of a feeder device.
Feeder.feederOperatingState: Allows for the control of a feeder device.

GasMeter.gasMeter: Read the gas consumption of an energy metering device

GasValve.gasMeter: Read the gas consumption of an energy metering device
GasValve.valve: Allows for the control of a valve device

Humidifier.humidifierMode: Maintains and sets the state of an humidifier
Humidifier.switch: Allows for the control of a switch device

HumiditySensor.relativeHumidityMeasurement: Allow reading the relative humidity from devices that support it

Irrigator.irrigatorOperatingState: Allows for the control of a irrigator device.
Irrigator.switch: Allows for the control of a switch device
Irrigator.irrigatorPortion: Allows for the portion control of a irrigator device.

LeakSensor.leakSensor: A Device that senses water leakage

Light.switchLevel: Allows for the control of the level of a device like a light or a dimmer switch.
Light.switch: Allows for the control of a switch device
Light.colorControl: Allows for control of a color changing device by setting its hue, saturation, and color values

LightSensor.lightLevel: A numerical representation of the brightness intensity

MotionSensor.motionSensor:
• active - The value when motion is detected
• inactive - The value when no motion is detected

PresenceSensor.presenceSensor: The ability to see the current status of a presence sensor device

Pump.pumpOperationMode: Allows for setting the operation mode on a pump.
Pump.switch: Allows for the control of a switch device
Pump.pump: Allows for the control of a pump device

Refrigerator.switch: Allows for the control of a switch device
Refrigerator.refrigeration: Allows for the control of the refrigeration.

RobotCleaner.switch: Allows for the control of a switch device
RobotCleaner.robotCleanerCleaningMode: Allows for the control of the robot cleaner cleaning mode.

Shade.windowShadeLevel: Allows for the control of the level of a window shade.
Shade.windowShade: Allows for the control of the window shade.

Siren.switch: Allows for the control of a switch device
Siren.sirenMode: Allows for the control of the siren.

SmartPlug.voltageMeasurement: Get the value of voltage measured from devices that support it
SmartPlug.currentMeasurement: Get the value of electrical current measured from a device.
SmartPlug.switch: Allows for the control of a switch device
SmartPlug.powerMeter: Allows for reading the power consumption from devices that report it

SmokeDetector.smokeDetector: A device that detects the presence or absence of smoke.

SoilMoistureSensor.soilHumidityMeasurement: Allow reading the soil humidity from devices that support it

SoundSensor.soundPressureLevel: Gets the value of the sound pressure level.

Speaker.switch: Allows for the control of a switch device
Speaker.mediaPlayback: Allows for the control of the media playback.

Recorder.switch: Allows for the control of a switch device

Switch.switch: Allows for the control of a switch device

Television.tvChannel: Allows for the control of the TV channel.
Television.audioMute: Allows for the control of audio mute.
Television.switch: Allows for the control of a switch device
Television.audioVolume: Allows for the control of audio volume.

TemperatureSensor.temperatureMeasurement: Get the temperature from a Device that reports current temperature

Valve.valve: Allows for the control of a valve device

Window.windowControl: Allows for the control of the window shade.

FallDetector.fallDetection: Detects if a fall has occurred

OccupancySensor.presenceSensor: The ability to see the current status of a presence sensor device

Relay.switch: Allows for the control of a switch device

Timer.timer: The Timer allows for interacting with devices that serve as timers
